greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Lexicographically last solution to Erdős's Last Equation in n variables, x_1*...*x_n = n*(x_1 + ... + x_n), with 1 <= x_1 <= ... <= x_n, written as triangle T(n,k), 1<=k<=n.
comment: a(1) = T(1,1) = 1 assumed. Any number is a solution for n=1.
reference: R. K. Guy, Sum equals product. in: Unsolved Problems in Number Theory, 3rd ed. New York: Springer-Verlag, chapter D24, (2004), 299-301.
link: David A. Corneth, list of solutions and product of variables of solutions for n = 2..160, omitting ones.
results.author: _Hugo Pfoertner_, Nov 08 2019
